suppress.notes:
CVE-2018-1258 affects Spring Framework 5.0.5, we are using 5.2.0+ false positive for artifacts * spring-boot-starter-security-2.2.0.RELEASE.jar * spring-security-*-5.2.0.RELEASE.jar
see * https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258

CVE-2019-10101 affects Kotlin before 1.3.30, we are using 1.3.41+
see * https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-10101

CVE-2019-10102 is about Ktor, which we don't use
see * https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-10102

CVE-2019-10103 affects Kotling before 1.3.30, we are using 1.3.41+
see * https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-10103

Suppress all CVE for org.testcontainers.postgresql dependencies that are matched by CPEs targeting postgresql:postgresql dependencies but not testcontainers postgresql integration. Those are false-positive matches for basically everything that contains /.*postgresql.*/ and a version in its filename. In general postgresql:postgresql and testcontainers:postgresql do not share a single line of code or a somehow depending on eachother.
